publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1976 Margaret Mitchell: Just One Click in Scotland—That the Parliament notes the one-day conference held on 9 November 2004 by Barnardo’s Scotland aimed at promoting the safety of children online; congratulates Barnardo’s for continuing to highlight this important issue and spread awareness of the dangers; notes that there is a lack of available data about the extent of internet grooming in Scotland, and therefore calls on the Scottish Executive to undertake research into the scale of the problem and to carry out a high-profile awareness campaign alerting parents and young people to the dangers of grooming over the internet and mobile phones.

S2M-1976 Just One Click in Scotland (lodged on 9 November 2004) Christine Grahame*, Alex Johnstone*, Shiona Baird*, Ms Sandra White*, Murray Tosh*, Chris Ballance*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Murdo Fraser*, Bill Aitken*

S2M-1976 Just One Click in Scotland (lodged on 9 November 2004) Phil Gallie*, Bruce Crawford*, Rob Gibson*, John Scott*, Robin Harper*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Eleanor Scott*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Alex Neil*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Mr David Davidson*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Alex Fergusson*

S2M-1976 Margaret Mitchell: Just One Click in Scotland—That the Parliament notes the one-day conference held on 9 November 2004 by Barnardo’s Scotland aimed at promoting the safety of children online; congratulates Barnardo’s for continuing to highlight this important issue and spread awareness of the dangers; notes that there is a lack of available data about the extent of internet grooming in Scotland, and therefore calls on the Scottish Executive to undertake research into the scale of the problem and to carry out a high-profile awareness campaign alerting parents and young people to the dangers of grooming over the internet and mobile phones. Supported by: Christine Grahame, Alex Johnstone, Shiona Baird, Ms Sandra White, Murray Tosh, Chris Ballance, Roseanna Cunningham, Richard Lochhead, Mr Ted Brocklebank, Murdo Fraser, Bill Aitken, Phil Gallie, Bruce Crawford, Rob Gibson, John Scott, Robin Harper, Mrs Nanette Milne, Eleanor Scott, Mr Brian Monteith, Alex Neil, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Mr David Davidson, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Alex Fergusson
S2M-1976 Just One Click in Scotland (lodged on 9 November 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*, Margo MacDonald*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-1976 Just One Click in Scotland (lodged on 9 November 2004) Mary Scanlon*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1976 Just One Click in Scotland (lodged on 9 November 2004) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-1976 Just One Click in Scotland (lodged on 9 November 2004) Alasdair Morgan*
